description: This file defines a REST API controller named GameController for a chess game backend. It handles HTTP requests related to creating games, joining games, retrieving game state, making moves, resigning, and querying legal moves. The controller interacts with the GameService to perform operations and returns structured responses for each endpoint. It also includes annotations for API documentation and uses data transfer objects (DTOs) to encapsulate request and response data.
external_methods: service.makeMove(UUID id, String playerId, Move move)

classes.name: GameController
classes.description: REST API controller for managing chess games, including creating, joining, querying, making moves, resigning, and retrieving legal moves.

methods.name: createGame
methods.description: Creates a new chess game with specified white and optional black players.

methods.name: joinGame
methods.description: Allows a player to join an existing game as black.

methods.name: getGame
methods.description: Retrieves the current state of the specified game.

methods.name: makeMove
methods.description: Performs a move in the specified game, validating legality and updating game state.

methods.name: resign
methods.description: Allows a player to resign from the game.

methods.name: legalMoves
methods.description: Returns a list of legal move targets from a given square.

methods.name: toState
methods.description: Helper method to convert a Game object into a GameStateResponse DTO.
